title: Colors 2020

metadata.description: Learn about Colors 2020 with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Every year the
Pantone Color Institute
evaluates the colors shown by fashion designers at the New York Fashion Week.
This information is used to create The Pantone Color of the Year and the 
Pantone Fashion Color Report with the top fashion colors for the year:
Color of the Year 2020
Classic Blue
HEX: #0F4C81
PANTONE 19-4052
Spring / Summer Colors 2020
Flame Scarlet
HEX: #CD212A
PANTONE 18-1662
Saffron
HEX: #FFA500
PANTONE 14-1064
Biscay Green
HEX: #56C6A9
PANTONE 15-5718
Chive
HEX: #4B5335
PANTONE 19-0323
Faded Denim
HEX: #798EA4
PANTONE 17-4021
Orange Peel
HEX: #FA7A35
PANTONE 16-1359
Mosaic Blue
HEX: #00758F
PANTONE 18-4528
Sunlight
HEX: #EDD59E
PANTONE 13-0822
Coral Pink
HEX: #E8A798
PANTONE 14-1318
Cinnamon Stick
HEX: #9C4722
PANTONE 18-1345
Grape Compote
HEX: #6B5876
PANTONE 18-3513
Classic Spring / Summer Colors 2020
Lark
HEX: #B89B72
PANTONE 16-1324
Navy Blazer
HEX: #282D3C
PANTONE 19-3923
Brilliant White
HEX: #EDF1FF
PANTONE 11-4001
Ash
HEX: #A09998
PANTONE 16-3802
Autumn / Winter Colors 2020
Amberglow
HEX: #DC793E
PANTONE 16-1350
Samba
HEX: #A2242F
PANTONE 19-1662
Sandstone
HEX: #C48A69
PANTONE 16-1328
Classic Blue
HEX: #34568B
PANTONE 19-4052
Green Sheen
HEX: #D9CE52
PANTONE 13-0648
Rose Tan
HEX: #D19C97
PANTONE 16-1511
Ultramarine Green
HEX: #006B54
PANTONE 18-5338
Fired Brick
HEX: #6A2E2A
PANTONE 19-1337
Peach Nougat
HEX: #E6AF91
PANTONE 14-1220
Magenta Purple
HEX: #6C244C
PANTONE 19-2428
Download the Libraries
Downloads
The Fashion Color libraries can be downloaded from:
W3.CSS Fashion Colors

★
+1

quiz.question: Which best describes the main purpose of this c feature?
quiz.explanation: This feature serves multiple purposes in software development.

summary: This tutorial covers Colors 2020 concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Colors 2020 effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of Colors 2020 and how to apply it in your projects.
